alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Carter; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:15AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow showers and localized blowing snow expected. Snow accumulations up to an inch or two, greatest over the higher hills and close to the mountains. Northwest winds gusting 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Montana. Portions of north central Wyoming. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and areas of poor visibility due to snow and blowing snow. Highways that will see travel impacts include I-90 from Lodge Grass to Sheridan and Piney Creek, and US-212 over Lame Deer Divide and Camps Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect wind chills to fall to the single digits and teens on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Carter; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
